Question: This person spent the last six years of his life in confinement by the British on the island of Saint Helena.
Hints: Portugal did not comply with the Continental System, so in 1807 this person invaded with the support of Spain.
This person had a civil marriage with Joséphine de Beauharnais, without religious ceremony, on 9 March 1796.
The Peninsular War and 1812 French invasion of Russia marked turning points in this person's fortunes.
